TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStructuralComparable

summary.span: 支持集合对象的结构化比较。

span.span: Supports the structural comparison of collection objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口使您能够实现集合成员的自定义比较。The interface enables you to implement customized comparisons for collection members. 也就是说，您可以准确定义一个集合对象在排序顺序中位于同一位置之前、之后或发生的含义，作为第二个集合对象。That is, you can define precisely what it means for one collection object to precede, follow, or occur in the same position in the sort order as a second collection object. 然后，你可以指定将此定义用于接受接口的集合类型 。You can then specify that this definition be used with a collection type that accepts the interface. 此接口具有一个成员， 该成员确定当前集合对象在排序顺序中是小于、等于还是大于第二个对象。The interface has a single member, , which determines whether the current collection object is less than, equal to, or greater than a second object in the sort order. 当前实例中的成员或元素与第二个对象中的成员或元素的实际比较是通过 接口实现执行的，后者包含自定义比较的定义。The actual comparison of the members or elements in the current instance with those in a second object is performed by an interface implementation, which contains the definition of your custom comparison. > [!NOTE] > 接口仅支持用于排序或排序的结构比较。The interface supports only structural comparisons for sorting or ordering. 接口支持结构相等性的自定义比较。The interface supports custom comparisons for structural equality. .NET Framework 提供了两个默认比较器。The .NET Framework provides two default comparers. 一个由属性返回， 另一个由 属性返回。One is returned by the property; the other is returned by the property. 泛型元组类 ( 、 、 等) 并且 类提供接口的显式实现 。The generic tuple classes (, , , and so on) and the class provide explicit implementations of the interface. 通过将 c # 中的 (强制转换 ) 或将) Visual Basic 中的 (转换为 接口值，并将 实现作为参数提供给 方法，可以为数组或集合定义自定义排序顺序。By casting (in C#) or converting (in Visual Basic) the current instance of an array or tuple to an interface value and providing your implementation as an argument to the method, you can define a custom sort order for the array or collection. 不过， 在大多数情况下不会直接调用方法。However, you do not call the method directly in most cases. 相反， 方法通过对等方法进行调用 。Instead, the method is called by sorting methods such as . 在这种情况下，需要定义 实现，并将其作为参数传递给排序方法或集合对象的类构造函数。In this case, you define your implementation and pass it as an argument to a sorting method or collection object's class constructor. 然后，在对 集合进行排序时，将自动调用具有自定义比较器的方法。The method with your custom comparer is then called automatically whenever the collection is sorted. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组 ，其中包含三个美国城市的人口数据（从1960到2000）。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 六元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的五个组件表示从1960到2000的10年间隔的人口。The remaining five components represent the population at ten-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`类提供一个 实现，该实现允许 sextuples 的数组按其任何一个组件进行排序。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 向类中的构造函数提供了两个值 `PopulationComparer` ：定义排序顺序的组件的位置，以及一个指示是否应按升序或降序对元组对象进行排序的布尔值。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: the position of the component that defines the sort order, and a Boolean value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 然后，该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中的元素，按第三个组件对其进行排序， (1970) 中的人口并显示它们，然后按照) 2000 中的人口 (第六个组件对其进行排序，并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由 数组中每个元组对象的方法隐式调用。The method is called implicitly by the method for each tuple object in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

public int CompareTo (object? other, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);

summary.span: 确定当前集合对象在排序顺序中的位置是位于另一个对象之前、之后还是与其位置相同。

span.span: Determines whether the current collection object precedes, occurs in the same position as, or follows another object in the sort order.

returns.span: 指明当前集合对象与 的排序顺序关系的带符号整数：

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relationship of the current collection object to in the sort order:

returns.span: - 如果小于 0，表明当前实例先于 。

span.span: - If less than 0, the current instance precedes .

returns.span: - 如果等于 0，表明当前实例和 的顺序相同。

span.span: - If 0, the current instance and are equal.

returns.span: - 如果大于 0，表明当前实例后于 。

span.span: - If greater than 0, the current instance follows .

description.span: 当前实例位于 之前。
当前实例与 位于同一位置。

span.span: The current instance and are equal.

description.span: 当前实例位于 之后。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法支持数组和元组对象的自定义结构比较和排序。The method supports custom structural comparison and sorting of array and tuple objects. 方法调用 `comparer` 对象的 方法来比较单个数组元素或元组组件，从第一个元素或组件开始。The method calls the `comparer` object's method to compare individual array elements or tuple components, starting with the first element or component. 当下列条件之一成立时，单独调用 end 和方法将返回一个值：The individual calls to end and the method returns a value when one of the following conditions becomes true: - 方法返回-1。The method returns -1. - 方法返回1。The method returns 1. - 为集合对象中的最后一个元素或组件调用方法。The method is called for the last element or component in the collection object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组 ，其中包含三个美国城市的人口数据（从1960到2000）。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 六元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的五个组件表示从1960到2000的10年间隔的人口。The remaining five components represent the population at ten-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`类提供一个 实现，该实现允许 sextuples 的数组按其任何一个组件进行排序。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 向类中的构造函数提供了两个值 `PopulationComparer` ：定义排序顺序的组件的位置，以及一个 指示是否应按升序或降序对元组对象进行排序的值。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: the position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 然后，该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中的元素，按第三个组件对其进行排序， (1970) 中的人口并显示它们，然后按照) 2000 中的人口 (第六个组件对其进行排序，并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 实现。Note that the example does not directly call the implementation. 此方法由 数组中每个元组对象的方法隐式调用。The method is called implicitly by the method for each tuple object in the array.
